casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Maurice BYRD. No. 601P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Amar Majmundar, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of December 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review N.C.G.S. 7A-30(B)(2)(C)(1)(2)(D)(1)(2)":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
